welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hatfield, a charming city known for its rich history and stunning landscapes. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Luton Airport Parkway Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is connected to the Luton Airport Parkway railway station, providing easy access to the airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport serves all flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at London City Airport offers a luxurious and exclusive experience for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a free basic option and a paid premium option for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, primarily used for domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, primarily used for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: One of the main terminals at Heathrow Airport, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Heathrow Airport, primarily used for long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, primarily used by British Airways and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for up to 4 hours. After that, a fee may apply.
